name: Spiders Everywhere!
description:
THIS IS THE VERY FIRST LITTLE ADVENTURE OF LIL BABY POOP.

HELP HIM THROUGH HIS NIGHTMARE BY AVOIDING OR DESTROYING ALL SPIDERS!

IT'S A CUTE SIDE-SCOLLING RUN 'N GUN ACTION GAME IN A VINTAGE RUBBERHOSE CARTOON STYLE.

IT ONLY HAS ONE LEVEL, BUT ENEMIES ARE POSITIONED RANDOMLY EVERY TIME YOU PLAY.

ALL ART AND ANIMATIONS  ARE CREATED BY ARNE S. REISMUELLER.

THIS GAME IS MADE WITH THE GODOT ENGINE.

ANY QUESTIONS OR INQUIRIES:
